SEARCH
Package SharedWebInterfaces.SharedInterfaces

Interface ViewAPI_Interface

All Superinterfaces:
GeneralAPI_Interface
All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewAPI
public interface ViewAPI_Interface extends GeneralAPI_Interface
The interface View api interface. This interface is used to define the methods that the server can perform on the view through the messages sent.

    • setCanBePlaced

      void setCanBePlaced(boolean[] canBePlaced)
      Sets can be placed, a boolean value for each card in you hand. It is true when that card can be placed "front", else it is false
      Parameters:
      canBePlaced - the can be placed value
